abilities.name: El'druin's Might
abilities.description: Deals 110 damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Reactivating will teleport Tyrael to the blade and slow nearby enemies again.

abilities.name: Righteousness
abilities.description: Shields Tyrael for 336 damage and nearby allies for 135 damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Rake target area for 144 damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

heroics.name: Judgment
heroics.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 damage.

heroics.name: Sanctification
heroics.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.
